text: Joan Cervós Moro (born 24 February 1998) is an Andorran footballer who plays as a left-back for American club Colorado Springs Switchbacks and the Andorra national team. ==Club career== ===Colorado Springs Switchbacks=== In January 2020, Cervós joined USL Championship club Colorado Springs Switchbacks FC. He made his league debut for the club in the opening match of the season, playing the entirety of a 2-1 away victory over OKC Energy FC. ==International career== Cervós made his international debut for Andorra on 3 June 2018 in a friendly match against Cape Verde.
